籤詩版本二:
Ke u eletsa hore u se ke ua kopa thuso ho eena.
Haeba u il'o rola patsi 'me ho na le noha ka har'a joang, u ka' na ua longoa ke chefo 'me ua hlonama.
詩意:
Hexagram ena ke letšoao la ho lula u sireletsehile le ho ipoloka.
Hlokomela nthong tsohle.
解曰: Koala molomo oa hao 'me u tšoare meno a hao. Ha a tsotelle. Haeba u ikutloa u le molato. Qetellong ea itematsa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Seboka sa chessboard
Moemphera Taizong oa Leloko la Tang o ne a hatela ka bophirimela 'me a qabeletsoe Toropong ea Suoyang. Cheng Yaojin o ile a khutlela Beijing ho ea kopa thuso.
Xue Dingshan o ile a laeloa ho sebetsa e le Second Route Marshal 'me a ea pholosa Morena le ho khutsisa Xiliao.
Ka mor'a hore sehlopha sa batho se tsoe Yumen Pass, se ile sa fihla Qipan Mountain. A lika-likelitsoe ke bahlankana ba likete thabeng, Dou Yihu, morena oa thaba, o ile a hlōloa ke molaoli oa Tang Luo Tong. Xue Dingshan o ile a etella pele masole a phahameng ka ho fetisisa 'me a tlama Luo Tong.
(Leboko le saennweng le dumellana le sena)
Dou Xiantong o ile a bona bokhabane ba Xue Dingshan mme a batla ho etsa setsoalle le Feng Luan, empa Xue Dingshan a hana. Hamorao, Dou Yihu o ile a boela a etella pele barab'abo rōna ba Qipanshan ho khutlela Lelokong la Tang ho ea thusa Leloko la Tang ho hapa Liao Bophirimela.
聖意: Tšireletseho ea lapeng, boithati, ho batla maruo, ho emela nako, ho thella ha khoebo, lenyalo le sa lumelloe, Liujia alamo ea bohata, ba tsamaeang ka maoto ba thibang masimo, liboko tsa silika, mehlape e tšeletseng, batho ba lahlehileng, ho thibela linyeoe tsa sechaba, tahlehelo (Mo Xing) Ho falla, conservative, thepa e lahlehileng, lefu le thata ho hlaphoheloa, lebitla la thaba, mahlohonolo
第X籤: Mohloli oa lotho ea mashome a mararo a metso e supileng
